findings.title: Functions should be explicit with their access levels
findings.description: Each function should explicitly specify its access level (public/private)

findings.title: //TODO: change this comment should be removed
findings.description: There is a commented out line which would have allowed token transfer.

findings.title: Incorrect Ether Conversion
findings.description: The requirement 'msg.value >= 10 finney' is incorrect as 10 finney is equivalent to 0.01 ether, not 0.1 ether.

findings.title: canWithdraw naming convention
findings.description: The variable 'canWithdraw' does not follow industry conventions as it is named similarly to a modifier declaration.

findings.title: Token Sale logic is highly coupled with Token Contract itself
findings.description: Decoupling of token sale logic and token contract is recommended to manage them separately.

findings.title: withdraw Function Should Be Constant
findings.description: The withdraw function should be a constant function because it's called from a constant function.
